page_content:
Social
Supporting our people, customers and communities  
is a vital part of who we are at Sonos. Promoting 
diversity, equity and inclusion, responsible supply  
chain practices, philanthropic efforts and privacy,  
help us build a stronger, more resilient company.  
And it starts with listening and understanding their 
needs and expectations so we can work towards 
shared goals that make a positive impact for all. 2022 Listen Better Report
21 Environmental Social Governance ESG Supplement
